submission:
from typing import List

class Solution:
    def minimumOperations(self, nums: List[int], tar: List[int]) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        t = [0] * n
        
        for i in range(n):
            t[i] = tar[i] - nums[i]

        pos = 0
        m = 0
        ans = abs(t[0])
        m = ans

        if t[0] >= 0:
            pos = 1

        for i in range(1, n):
            if t[i] < 0 and pos == 1:
                ans += abs(t[i])
                m = abs(t[i])
                pos = 0
                continue
            if t[i] >= 0 and pos == 0:
                ans += abs(t[i])
                m = abs(t[i])
                pos = 1
                continue
            if m >= abs(t[i]):
                m = abs(t[i])
                continue
            else:
                ans += abs(t[i]) - m
                m = abs(t[i])

        return ans
